root.name: ImgLib2-Icy
root.author: tinevez - Jean-Yves Tinevez
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2015-05-28 16:13:27
First non-beta version. Update the submodule to latest release version of each package:
- imglib2: v2.2.1 - imglib2-algorithm: v0.2.1 - imglib2-algorithm-fft: v0.1.2 - imglib2-algorithm-gpl: v0.1.4 - imglib2-realtransform: v2.0.0-beta29 - imglib2-roi: v0.3.1 - imglib2-ui: v2.0.0-beta29
- Version 0.0.3.1b Date 2015-05-05 17:42:44
- Really upload the right file.
- Version 0.0.3.0b Date 2015-05-05 17:07:20
- Ship a utility class that can generate Imgs with specific dimensionality.
- Version 0.0.2.2b Date 2015-05-04 18:19:34
- Add a basic test plugin that states whether wrapping works. - Add a method to return the dimension arrangement of a sequence.
- Version 0.0.2.1b Date 2015-05-04 16:42:24
- Version 0.0.1.0b Date 2015-05-04 15:18:39
